00039 void Locust::DoExtraUpdates(float fTime)
00040 {
00041         // if there is a current target follow it
00042         if (m_pTarget)
00043         {
00044                 NxVec3 target = m_pTarget->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00045                 m_spAgent->Update(target);
00046                 m_spAgent->LookAt(target);
00047         }
00048         // else put a different target
00049         else
00050         {
00051                 NxVec3 target = NxVec3(100.0, 500.0, -100.0);
00052                 m_spAgent->Update(target);
00053                 m_spAgent->LookAt(GameManager::Get()->GetQueen()->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition());
00054         }
00055 }
00056 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00063 bool Locust::DoExtraInits()
00064 {
00065         if (!GameCharacter::DoExtraInits())
00066         {
00067                 return false;
00068         }
00069 
00070         // create a behavior combo
00071         NiTPointerList<BehaviorPtr> lBehavior;
00072         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Arrival());
00073         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Wander());
00074         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Departure());
00075         //lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Separation());
00076 
00077         float arrivalC    = 1.0f;
00078         float wanderC     = 0.3f;
00079         float departureC  = 1.0f;
00080         float separationC = 0.9f;
00081 
00082         NiTPointerList<float> lBehaviorCoef;
00083         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(arrivalC);
00084         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(wanderC);
00085         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(departureC);
00086         //lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(separationC);
00087 
00088         // set the behavior
00089         BehaviorComboPtr behavior = NiNew BehaviorCombo(lBehavior, lBehaviorCoef);
00090 
00091         m_spAgent->GetController()->SetBehavior((Behavior*)behavior);
00092         GameManager::Get()->AddEnemy(this);
00093         //m_spTarget = GameManager::Get()->GetQueen();
00094         
00095         return true;
00096 }
